description.en:
"Rotten Floki is a virtual environment where users may create, control, and monetize game experiences with non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and the platform's utility token – Rotten.

In-game items are stored as NFTs on the Solana blockchain. The Rotten token uses the BEP-20 standard, but will support ERC-20 once cross-chain is deployed. The platform runs on a standard backend operating on AWS with logs being stored on Elasticsearch. Each in-game asset is hashed and deployed on the blockchain using a smart contract to ensure full ownership."
